summary: This document is an email chain regarding the case USA v. Maxwell, notifying parties of a removal hearing scheduled for July 2, 2020, at 3:30 PM via video conference before Magistrate Judge Andrea K. Johnstone. It includes an attachment reference to a detention memorandum filed in the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case USA v. Maxwell, for whom a removal hearing is being scheduled.

persons.name: Andrea K. Johnstone
persons.context: The judicial officer before whom the removal hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell is scheduled.

events.title: Removal Hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A removal hearing scheduled via video conference for Ghislaine Maxwell in case USA v. Maxwell.

keyFacts: A removal hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell was scheduled for July 2, 2020, at 3:30 PM via video conference before Magistrate Judge Andrea K. Johnstone.
The case is identified as USA v. Maxwell, case number 1:20-mj-00132-AJ.
A detention memorandum was filed in the Southern District of New York and referenced as an attachment in the email chain.
The notification was generated automatically by the CM/ECF system of the U.S. District Court for the District of New Hampshire.
